markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diverse Weapon Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=714) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 226 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Fighter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=7)

**Prerequisites**
[Fighter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=709); expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack

</column>

---

Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert, and your proficiency rank for advanced weapons increases to trained.
name: Diverse Weapon Expert
prerequisite: Fighter Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
prerequisite_markdown: [Fighter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=709); expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
